name: The Sims 4: Cottage Living
storyline:
Lead the simple life with The Sims 4 Cottage Living Expansion Pack. Get cozy with animal friends in the area, grow your own food and enjoy the charm of the local village.

Cows provide fresh milk while chickens lay eggs in the coop. Beware of foxes (they love eggs), and keep an eye out for wildlife to earn their trust for occasional gifts and help in the garden.

Whether Sims grow their own produce, visit the village market or forage in the wild, fresh is best. Up for a challenge? Try growing oversized crops and enter the Finchwick Fair competition.

Henford-on-Bagley is a cozy village where everyone knows your name. So pack a picnic basket or head to The Gnome's Arms pub to kick back with locals after a long day. Learn about the town’s lore from neighbors for fun surprises.
summary: Delight in the quaint charm of The Sims 4: Cottage Living, an expansion pack for The Sims 4, with animal friends, garden-to-table meals, and a close-knit community. Explore the forest to befriend woodland creatures, or head to town to meet the locals. Whether Sims are hugging a cow, making friends (or enemies) with their chickens, or growing the biggest vegetables around, the countryside presents abundant new ways to reconnect with the world.
